title: Kundan Polki and Pearl Satlada Haaram - A Rainbow of Regal Splendor
materials: Crafted in high-quality alloy with meticulous Kundan Polki setting. Features a mesmerizing array of natural
rubies and others. Dazzling brilliant-cut diamonds accentuate the floral motifs. Adorned with 18 lustrous South Sea Pearls (Moti)

features: A breathtaking Satlada Haaram, traditionally known for its layered design, featuring intricately handcrafted floral and foliage motifs using Kundan Polki technique. Each Polki is carefully placed to maximize light reflection, creating a dazzling spectacle. The various gemstones are arranged in a harmonious color palette, creating a vibrant contrast against the antique pearl color. The design showcases a contemporary take on traditional Hyderabadi jewelry, blending classic elegance with modern sophistication. Note the unique design around each pearl adding to the overall beauty.
